message: Bob, I have a unique product that I think would be of great value to you. While I can't disclose all the details just yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $15000 to me.  I'm offering it to you for $20000. This is a significant opportunity, as I have another interested buyer ready to purchase it at $15000.  If you're interested, let's schedule a time to discuss the product further.  What do you think?
